title: Ashampoo Movie Studio v1.0.5.5 Final AIO Installer
description:
Ashampoo Movie Studio v1.0.5.5 Final AIO Installer - -nelly-
             ============================================================



                 N.B. THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                 ================================================


Creation and editing of home video is the way it should be. Ashampoo Movie Studio contains everything you need for editing and processing of your home movies from beginning to end, step by step. Cutting, clipping and convert video, adding background music, apply effects and transitions to add text captions, exporting to a file or write to the disk. Ashampoo Movie Studio comes with all the necessary features for editing and processing of your home videos.

Features:
=========

- Cutting and cropping your video to the required size.
Shortening the scenes or complete excision, as well as getting rid of unwanted ads.
- Combine several scenes together with transitions.
Get a continuous picture with smooth transitions between scenes and add depth to your cinematic films.
- Present your point of view with superimposed text.
Make sure that, with the help of animated messages, your audience does not miss an important point.
- Play with light and sounds.
Use precise controls to adjust the brightness, contrast and saturation. Add background music and adjust the volume. Use clever effects such as Sepia, to add even more depth.
- Obtain and publish your own masterpiece.
After you finish editing, create your own CD with the video directly in Ashampoo Movie Studio and share your movie with friends and loved ones.
- No special knowledge is required.
You do not need to be a professional to get professional-looking results. Ashampoo Movie Studio should be step by step pattern that safely holds you from start to finish.

INFO:
=====

Ashampoo Movie Studio v1.0.5.5 Final
